MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH51 postcode area of Boness. We are aware of previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our emergency response team have arrived back to site and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:05pm on Monday, 04 January 2021
